item.title: Nicolo add a quote by Alan Moore
item.description: "People shouldn't be afraid of their government. Governments should be afraid of their people." -- Alan Moore

item.title: Nicolo add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "What I say is, a town isn't a town without a bookstore. It may call itself a town, but unless it's got a bookstore it knows it's not fooling a soul." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Nicolo add a quote by Desiderius Erasmus Roterodamus
item.description: "When I have a little money, I buy books; and if I have any left, I buy food and clothes." -- Desiderius Erasmus Roterodamus

item.title: Nicolo add a quote by David Eddings
Nicolo add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Never, never, never give in!" -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Nicolo add a quote by Desiderius Erasmus
item.description: "Your library is your paradise." -- Desiderius Erasmus

item.title: Nicolo add a quote by Arthur Conan Doyle
item.description: "When you have eliminated all which is impossible, then whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth." -- Arthur Conan Doyle

item.title: Nicolo add a quote by Bryan Lee O'Malley
item.description: "We are Sex Bob-Omb and we are here to make you think about death and get sad and stuff!" -- Bryan Lee O'Malley

item.title: Nicolo add a quote by Bryan Lee O'Malley
